ReviewText: An unforgettable experience! The Boga Lake trek was challenging but worth every step. The guide was knowledgeable, and the eco-friendly initiatives were commendable.
The Sajek to Purbachhara trail was beautiful, and I loved how the organizers prioritized sustainability. However, the accommodation could be improved.
Trekking to Nafakhum Waterfall was an incredible journey! The pristine beauty and eco-friendly measures made it a guilt-free adventure.
Faipi Waterfall trek was scenic, but the trail was too slippery in some parts. Ensure you’re prepared for rough terrain!
Chimbuk Hill Sunrise Trek was awe-inspiring! I wish we could have spent more time at the summit. Guides were fantastic.
Nilgiri Hill trekking was a great family adventure. Couldn’t ask for a better view of the sunrise!
